nodes.text: Terandi was a male Daan from the city of Garth in the North Country of the planet Melida/Daan. He was the father of Micae. His wife died in an invasion of Garth by the Melida sometime during the Melida/Daan Civil War. Terandi fought and was killed in the Battle of the Plains, a skirmish fought to avenge the previous century's Battle of the North. A hologram of Micae left in a Hall of Evidence on Lake Weir mentioned Terandi, before Micae went on the describe his upcoming battle against the Melida.
